document_data.caption: A map showing Ale Street in east Zhentil Keep.
document_data.name: Ale Street
document_data.mainbody: '''Ale Street''' was a small road located in the city of [[Zhentil Keep]] during the midâ€“14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Location: Ale Street was located in Zhentil Keep's [[Zhentil Keep/Common Quarter|Common Quarter]] in the eastern section of the city. The road connected [[Beholder Street]] with the [[Street of Sorrow]]. [[Black Street]] intersected Ale Street near its midpoint.
